                            throws java.io.IOException
        Return true if the report file is already finished, a report is finished when the words 'Time end' appear.

        reportFile - The pathname of a report to analyze.
        Returns:
        If the reports is finished.

        java.io.IOException - Launch an exception in case that an error occurs

                                                 java.lang.String defaultName)
        Creates a file for which its name will be extracted from the file model if the defaultName is null or empty, and will be created in the same level of sourceFile.
        Parameters:
        source - The source file
        defaultName - The default name of the file
        Returns:
        The progressive file

        Parameters:

        filter - The filter that will be used.
        listToFill - The list where there will be stored the files that expire with the filter.

        Parameters:
